definition: abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Some people think that the Yanzi crocodile is the archetype of the dragon.
sentences.chinese: 有人认为龙的原型是扬子鳄。

sentences.english: The Chinese alligator is one of the most endangered reptiles in the world.
sentences.chinese: 扬子鳄是世界上最危险的爬行动物之一。

sentences.english: This paper described the morphology of gastric glands and mucous Surface in the hatchlings of Alligator sinensis.
sentences.chinese: 本文观察了初孵扬子鳄胃粘膜表面及胃腺的形态。

sentences.english: Reflect the genetic polymorphism of the Chinese alligator population is very low.
sentences.chinese: 反映了扬子鳄种群非常低的遗传多态性。

sentences.english: Today it is  estimated that only 120 are left in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 目前野生扬子鳄仅剩120只左右。

definition: see 白鱀豚|白𬶨豚[bai2 ji4 tun2]
(bird species of China) scaly-sided merganser (Mergus squamatus)
Yangtze giant soft-shell turtle (Rafetus swinhoei), a critically endangered species
mammals/also written 哺乳動物|哺乳动物
